short_summary: Metal filing and storage cabinets, delivery and installation to NCR by March 31 2023.
description: Metal filing and storage cabinets are required from National Resources Canada (NRCan). Office furniture is needed to be delivered and installed at The National Capital Region by March 31, 2023. This requirement is subject to Trade agreements as listed. The procurement is open to suppliers who are registered with the Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/C and are pre-qualified.

full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### Metal Filing and Storage Cabinets Requirement

Natural Resources Canada invites bids for the purchase, delivery, and installation of metal filing and storage cabinets to support the needs of The National Capital Region by March 31, 2023. This solicitation is open to the General Stream of Suppliers (SA holders).

### Background and Context

This Requirement is a direct result of the Canadian government's diverse market access agreements, including:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Columbia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chili Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

### Requirement Details

This tender is issued under the following product category(ies) of the PWGSC Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/C:

* Metal Filing and Storage Cabinets

Successful contractors must ensure the delivered products meet all security requirements.

### Procurement Method

This solicitation is a selective tendering under the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).

### Interested Parties

This tender is intended for General Stream of Suppliers (SA holders). To participate, suppliers must register on the Buy and Sell System (https://buyandsell.gc.ca).

### Tender Document Packages

Tender documents can be downloaded from the Buy and Sell System (https://buyandsell.gc.ca). Respondents must review the tender for information on the terms and conditions for response, timelines, and supporting documentation requirements.

### Important Dates

* Tender Closing: January 17, 2023, 13:00:00 (ET)
* Expected Contract Start Date: March 31, 2023 (or as specified within the contract documentation)
* Expected Contract End Date: None

### Additional Resources

For additional information, contact Shazeen Dhanani:

* Email: [shazeen.dhanani@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca](mailto:shazeen.dhanani@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca)

### Note

Note that the requirement exists and is open for responses. A review of the tender documents is recommended before submission.

Word Count: 398
End of Rewritten Announcement
